ratings.comment: Had her back in the day at SMSU.
Very cool professor. Super enthusiastic! Power points were well organized. Her test was really easy; she gave us a review sheet that really helped.
energetic, clear, does know her stuff - but extremely disorganized slides
She did a great job of teaching something that I was not interested in.
Professor was very interested in the subject and relayed that interest very well to the rest of the class. Interesting material and tests were easy. Would take a class with professor again.
Great teacher.  The labs are interesting but sometimes hard to take material directly to the test.  Slideshow is her lectures, but still interesting.
She's absolutely adorable and brings so much energy to her subject.
Easy class.  Just pay attention in lectures and you'll be fine. I didn't even read half the stuff and I'm getting an A.
Really cute, writed everything down during lecture... gives you a study guide
Lectures are clear, and she is obviously very, very excited about biological anthropology. Know everything in detail off the study guide for the exam. Not bad.
She has a study guide that has everything on the exam on it.  So easy!

She is incredibly enthusiastic,straightforward, and when it comes to the test, a pushover. gave us a review sheet that pretty much detailed every question on the test. If you aren't interested, she'll at least try and make it exciting. and yes, one of the hotter professors on campus, a fox for sure.

The most important thing about this class is showing up for lecture. Her notes are easy to understand and very clear. Her midterm is also based exactly on her notes so just get all the notes and read them over a few times. Oh yeah, she is eye-candy, so its a pleasure to pay attention.

She is a very enthusiastic bio. anthro. professor! Her lectures are so interesting that it inspired me to double major in anthropology. She writes down almost exactly what she says (and what's important on the midterm). Her midterm isn't hard as long as you study her notes and review sheet! =)

Professor Lambert was a fun and energetic professor, but the labs for this class were not at all useful and the tests were ridiculous.  I don't know how much of that was Lambert's fault and how much was the fault of the TAs for the class.  I don't recommend Anthro 105.
She's a really cool teacher and has an accent I can't figure out.
She did know her stuff, and has worked around the world. However, the lectures were very boring - simply copying a bunch of notes. The labs were even worse and the tests were difficult.

she knows her stuff really well, but is very disorganized when teaching. she scribbles her notes on the overhead and it is often hard to read, especially when she stands right in front of it. she is not a very friendly person, especially when you go to office hours, tests are difficult. don't take c

Prof. Lambert is an awesome professor.  She is very energetic and explains things in great detail.  She tells you exactly what is going to be on  the exams, and the exams are pretty easy if you just read over your notes periodically.
